explanation: The stage direction 'Au lever du rideau, Gontran est couché tout habillé sur le lit. Dix heures sonnent.' describes the initial setting of the scene, including the position of the character Gontran and the time. This fits the definition of 'setting' which is about stage description or play location.
stgdir: Au lever du rideau, Gontran est couché tout habillé sur le lit. Dix heures sonnent.
